metadata.title: MindFrame - Affirmations in Your Voice
metadata.description: AI creates personalized affirmations and voices them with your voice clone. Your brain can't critique its own voice.

hero.title: Your Voice Is the Most Powerful Tool
hero.subtitle: Your brain can't critique its own voice. AI creates personalized affirmations and voices them with your voice clone plus 40Hz binaural beats.

features.title: Why Your Own Voice Works Better

voiceClone.title: Your Voice Clone
voiceClone.description: Record 30 seconds — AI creates a perfect copy. Your own voice bypasses psychological barriers and triggers maximum subconscious trust.

ai.title: Personalized Affirmations
ai.description: Neural network creates texts for your specific task: remove pre-meeting anxiety, boost productivity, or prepare for sleep.

binaural.title: 40Hz Binaural Beats
binaural.description: Gamma frequency activates your brain into the right state: focus, relaxation, or deep sleep. Scientifically proven effect.

science.title: The Science Behind It
science.point1: Your brain can't critique its own voice — it's an evolutionary mechanism
science.point2: Your own voice activates trust zones 3x stronger than others
science.point3: Binaural beats synchronize brain hemispheres in 8-10 minutes

morning.title: Morning Protocol
morning.description: Dopamine activation for the entire day. Wake up with clarity and motivation.

anxiety.title: Before Important Meeting
anxiety.description: Remove anxiety in 5 minutes. Enter negotiations with confidence.

focus.title: Deep Work
focus.description: Flow state without distractions. Concentration for 2-3 hours.

sleep.title: Sleep Preparation
sleep.description: Transition to delta waves in 10 minutes. 92% report better sleep.

cta.title: Start with Free Generations
cta.subtitle: No card. No registration. Open in Telegram and try it now.

library.title: My Library
